message.body: Do I *need* to get the MLA handbook?
Lmao no. Did Rowley say you did?
Yeah. And I'm getting confused. But like I don't wanna
Exactly. At delta we used Chicago. Like ugh can't they stick to one
I mean it's good to have I guess. My teachers suggested getting Chicago or APA style handbooks because those are actually important. Rowley is just a huge stickler about mla for no reason

Yeah I know. But honestly I've been doing my papers with no real format and no one has a problem with it. Like its mostly MLA but with footnotes and probably some inaccuracies but I don't get any trouble for it
Haha that's good but also like... Then what's the point of the different systems
I really have no idea. It's just like important for impressing other smart people who read your essays
